ygData.subject: Re: Fishbone Earrings
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as I know they only come off of a fisherman in Qeynos hills, he spawns exactly 6 hours apart, and only has the earing 1 in 10 times.  The fisherman is
ygData.messageBody:
As far as I know they only come off of a fisherman in Qeynos hills, he
spawns exactly 6 hours apart, and only has the earing 1 in 10 times. The
fisherman is also 30+ level. A friend of mine has camped the spot in The
Rathe for days, he has his clock set for 6 hours, jumps on kills it, logs
for 6 hours, repeats.

He has only earned 1pair.

IMHO this is pretty unfair (not just that my friend camps the site) but you
take a serious faction hit with Qeynos vendors and eventually guards for
killing this guy. There should be some sort of quest for these, or at least
someway of killing a evil (or non aligned) character to get one.

Maybe some of the monsters in the sewers should have them occasionally.

Wenaddar (non camping bard) of Cazic-Thule

> -----Original Message-----
> From: karnax@... [SMTP:karnax@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 6:12 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQCheats] Fishbone Earrings
>
> From: karnax@...
>
> Does anyone know where the Fishbone earrings can be found, and what you
> have to do in order to get them? Is it a quest item, or do you just have
> to kill somebody?
